data.message: Why do I have to have a share button, when I don't want some friends to share? I don't want to have to share. And it should be up to us if we want people sharing or not.

replies.message: Hi Karen. When someone clicks Share below your post, they aren’t able to share your photos, videos or status updates through Facebook with people who weren’t in the audience you originally selected to share with. Only the people who could see those posts when you first made them are able to see them when someone clicks Share. Learn more:  http://bit.ly/2rv9CVO. -Jessica
I know some people that doesn't have the share option on their pictures and that's what I want to do on mine eliminate the share option like they did.
Hi Karen. If a post was shared with only Friends, you may not see the option to share it. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2qx02Ek. -Jessica
How do I find my restricted list?

All I need to know is why I have friends that has no share option on their pictures. And they won't tell me how they did it. They take my photos but I can't share theirs please help me how do I get rid of the share button on my photos, please help ☹️ I put this on 4 hours ago and still no help.
Are you done helping me now. I was really counting on you all.
